update product

PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_URL = #{itemUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BUY_COUNT = #{buyCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
